# ProductViewStyleConfiguration.Icon

**Structure**

A type-erased icon of an in-app purchase product.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Icon
```

## Getting a product view’s icon

- **icon**: A decorative view for merchandising the product.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
